During a business trip to Washington, April tells Leslie that she wants to quit her job. Back in Pawnee, Andy, Ben and Ron may have found her the perfect new job.

A traditional pie-baking competition causes problems for Ben's campaign, Ron goes on a scavenger hunt to find one of his house keys that April lost, and Gary loses his wedding ring in a drain outside the building.

column3: The Johnny Karate Super Awesome Musical Explosion Show
column8: The last episode of Andy's TV show brings his friends together.
Ben has to appoint a new mayor after mayor Gunderson dies, Ron grieves over the death of his barber, and Leslie helps Tom set up a predictably over-the-top marriage proposal.
As the team gathers one final time before they go their separate ways, we look 10 years into the future for each team member.
SpongeBob meets a squirrel named Sandy and is invited over to her house.
SpongeBob accidentally tears his pants.
SpongeBob and Patrick take Squidward jellyfishing.
SpongeBob and Patrick visit a retirement home.
SpongeBob takes his turn as hall monitor.
SpongeBob spends time with Plankton.
Squidward accidentally travels through time.
SpongeBob and Patrick go to the carnival.
SpongeBob has fun with a gum wrapper.
SpongeBob and Patrick try to help Sandy out when she feels homesick.
SpongeBob's breath starts to stink.
When Squidward unknowingly gives SpongeBob a pie laced with explosives, he attempts to make SpongeBob's last day on Earth meaningful.
SpongeBob and Patrick watch over Sandy's pets when she is out of town.
The Krusty Krab is open for 24 hours a day to make more money, and Squidward scares Spongebob with the "hash slinging slasher."
When Squidward tries to gain access to Spongebob and Patrick's "secret" club, the three of them end up stranded in the woods.
Squidward is forced to eat a Krabby Patty.
SpongeBob decides to throw a big party after discovering a "how to throw a party" kit in the grocery store.
Mr. Krabs gets ill after eating an old Krabby Patty that he refused to throw away.
SpongeBob has an accident while sand sledding! Afraid for his safety, he won't leave his house.
Everyone is in awe of Larry the Lobster's daredevil ways, especially SpongeBob and Patrick.
Everybody who's anybody is going to a big party in Bikini Bottom, but you have to be a certain shade of tan to get in.
When Squidward gets spritzed with plant growth spray, he becomes monstrously huge.
When Patrick realizes that he is the only one out of all his friends without a nose, he decides he needs to get a nose, too.
It's time to restock the secret Krabby Patty ingredient, and it is SpongeBob's duty to make sure the ingredient is delivered safely to the Krusty Krab.
Plankton has a customer who eats at the Chum Bucket every day.

column3: SpongeBob SquarePants vs. The Big One
column8: Spongebob and his friends are swept away by a giant wave and find themselves stranded on a remote tropical island. In order to get home, they must learn how to surf from enigmatic surf guru: Jack Kahuna Laguna.
SpongeBob adopts a stray worm which soon gives birth to a litter of baby worms.
Plankton tries to replace Karen with new computer inventions.
Krabs leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab for 15 minutes.
SpongeBob must be at Patrick's birthday party, help Sandy with her presentation, and help Mr. Krabs build a telescope, all at the same time.

Patrick is sick of all of his friends not being able to play with him because they have to put on their Krusty Krab hats and go to work. So when Mr. Krabs offers him a job as a sign-holder, Patrick is thrilled because it means he gets to wear a hat and work with all his friends! But Pat soon learns that wearing a hat isn't as simple as it looks.

A new toy store has opened up in Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob and Patrick couldn't be happier! In fact, they are having so much fun at the toy store that they accidentally get locked in when it closes. They soon find out that things are a lot different at the toy store when no one's around...
SpongeBob and Patrick protest the construction of a highway that would destroy Jellyfish Fields.
